Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
validation
The stage in the {software life-cycle} at the end of the development process where software is evaluated to ensure that it complies with the requirements.
(1995-02-14)

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Validation \Val`i*da"tion\, n. [Cf. F. validation.] The act of giving validity. [R.] --Knowles. [1913 Webster]
validation n 1: the act of validating; finding or testing the truth of something [syn: {proof}, {substantiation}] 2: the cognitive process of establishing a valid proof [syn: {establishment}]
